name: Shrine Seeker
description:
A game built in some free time to better get to grips with Unity. 

Go to each of the shrines to gain their power and unlock the door to the temple. Currently only the Air totem gives a gameplay bonus, allowing the player to double jump.

Music: 

Ancient Winds Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
